title: (x) djangoproject.com logo - DTL Prokyon {Mikey D, Alex Schmidt}
content:
so I was wondering what font is used in the logo for djangoproject.com

any ideas?

 [‹ (x) Sasquatch Books Publishing - Trade Gothic, TheSerif {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112201112/http:/typophile.com/node/31839 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Blades of Glory movie poster - House Bullet {Spencer Cross (self), Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112201112/http:/typophile.com/node/31827 "Go to next forum topic")
author: brbreslin

comments.content:
This must be DTL Prokyon Bold by Erhard Kaiser, available at the Dutch Type Library.

[http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/ProkyonBold.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112201112/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/ProkyonBold.html "http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/ProkyonBold.html")

Cheers,

alex

Also have a look at Linotype Veto:

[http://www.linotype.com/1169/veto-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112201112/http:/www.linotype.com/1169/veto-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/1169/veto-family.html")

very good looking, but not a zillion dollars like the DTL fonts
